title: 108_hr2458
content: Secure Annuity Income for Life Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income a percentage of lifetime annuity payments from a qualified trust to a qualified distributee. Provides for recapture and taxation of payments that are modified so as to not qualify as lifetime annuity payments. Applies such exclusion to: (1) section 403(a) plans, (2) section 403(b) plans, (3) section 408 plans. And (4) section 457 plans . Defines: (1) lifetime annuity payment, and (2) qualified distributee.
